articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Weird: The Al Yankovic Story trailer is a perfect parody of music biopics
articles.description: The latest trailer for The Roku Channel’s Weird Al Yankovic movie parodies musical biopics in all the right ways. The movie stars Daniel Radcliffe and is set to release on Nov. 4.
articles.content: The new trailer hits all the important beats in a very silly way

articles.author: Charlie Hall
articles.title: Homeworld 3 gameplay preview: Fight like a fish
articles.description: The developers of Homeworld 3 are on a mission to fulfill the promise of Homeworld 2, more than 20 years delayed. In this hands-on demo we piloted schools of heavily armed fish inside a massive space structure — not unlike a coral reef.
